title: Real Estate Market Cycles
instructions: Understand how real estate markets cycle and how to time your investments.

sections.title: The Real Estate Cycle
sections.content: Real estate markets move through predictable cycles: recovery, expansion, hyper-supply, and recession...

sections.title: Four Phases of Real Estate Cycles

items.description: Prices bottom out, foreclosure rates peak, smart investors buy
Prices rise, construction increases, optimism grows
Too much inventory, prices plateau, rental vacancies rise
Prices decline, overbuilding leads to foreclosures, cycle repeats

sections.title: Market Timing Indicators
sections.content:
• Price-to-rent ratios above 20 suggest overvaluation
• Months of housing supply over 6 months indicates buyer's market
• Rising interest rates typically cool markets
• Employment growth drives housing demand

key_takeaways: Real estate markets are cyclical, not linear
Understanding cycles helps with timing and strategy
Economic indicators help predict market direction
Patience and research beat emotional decisions
